languages.text: "А что насчет тех пленных, которых вы убили в шествии? Вы сочли себя вправе судить их сами?"
"What about those prisoners you killed during the procession? Did you feel entitled to stand in judgement over them?"
languages.original_text: "А что насчет тех пленных, которых вы убили в шествии? Вы сочли себя вправе судить их сами?"

traits.locale_text: "What about those prisoners you killed during the procession? Did you feel entitled to stand in judgement over them?"
"What about those prisoners you killed during the procession? Did you feel entitled to stand in judgement over them?"
"What about those prisoners you killed during the procession? Did you feel entitled to stand in judgement over them?"
"What about those prisoners you killed during the procession? Did you feel entitled to stand in judgement over them?"
"What about those prisoners you killed during the procession? Did you feel entitled to stand in judgement over them?"

languages.text: « Et les prisonniers que vous avez abattus pendant la procession ? Vous vous sentiez en droit de les juger, eux aussi ? »
languages.original_text: "What about those prisoners you killed during the procession? Did you feel entitled to stand in judgement over them?"

traits.locale_text: « Et les prisonniers que vous avez abattus pendant la procession ? Vous vous sentiez en droit de les juger, eux aussi ? »

languages.text: «¿Y qué hay de esos prisioneros a los que mató durante la procesión? ¿Se sentía con el derecho a enjuiciarles?».
languages.original_text: "What about those prisoners you killed during the procession? Did you feel entitled to stand in judgement over them?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué hay de esos prisioneros a los que mató durante la procesión? ¿Se sentía con el derecho a enjuiciarles?».

languages.text: 「行列中に殺した囚人はどうなったのですか？彼らに裁きを下す資格があると思いましたか？」
languages.original_text: "What about those prisoners you killed during the procession? Did you feel entitled to stand in judgement over them?"

traits.locale_text: 「行列中に殺した囚人はどうなったのですか？彼らに裁きを下す資格があると思いましたか？」

languages.text: “那些被你杀死的囚犯是怎么回事？你觉得你有正当的理由处死他们吗？”
languages.original_text: "What about those prisoners you killed during the procession? Did you feel entitled to stand in judgement over them?"

traits.locale_text: “那些被你杀死的囚犯是怎么回事？你觉得你有正当的理由处死他们吗？”

languages.text: "Was ist mit diesen Gefangenen, die Ihr während der Prozession getötet habt? Dachtet Ihr, Ihr hättet das Recht, über sie zu richten?"
languages.original_text: "What about those prisoners you killed during the procession? Did you feel entitled to stand in judgement over them?"

traits.locale_text: "Was ist mit diesen Gefangenen, die Ihr während der Prozession getötet habt? Dachtet Ihr, Ihr hättet das Recht, über sie zu richten?"

languages.text: "Tören esnasında öldürdüğün o mahkûmlara ne diyeceksin? Onların hükmünü vermeye hakkın varmış gibi mi hissettin?"
languages.original_text: "What about those prisoners you killed during the procession? Did you feel entitled to stand in judgement over them?"
